mecard.customer

Interface FormattedCustomer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BImportFormattedCustomer, FlatFormattedCustomer

    public interface FormattedCustomer
    Class for coordinating customer normalization and formatting. This class is responsible for acquiring the correct formatter, formatting the customer and managing the customer's record entries during the normalization process.
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

    • Method Detail

      • getFormattedCustomer

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFormattedCustomer()
        Returns:
        list of strings that represents the customer in the form that can be loaded by a ILS.

      • getFormattedHeader

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFormattedHeader()
        Returns:
        list of strings that represents the customer's meta data if any, can be loaded by a ILS.
